original_title: セカンドバージンの女 通り雨, 第二處女路雨
overview: The story is about Mayumi and a jobless youngster who enters her life. Mayumi is a rape victim, and is often haunted by the painful memories of her past. Mayumi chances upon this youngster, strikes a chord with him, and slowly shares her troubles and past memories.
title: 2nd Virgin Road
